column6: two gangs fighting in front of Angkor High School in Wat Bo Village
column8: left one man dead.------The victim was named as Paw Kheak
column9: a 25-year-old  Snooker Club employee.------The groups of young men clashed with knives and swords after confronting each other on motorcycles. The victim
column10: who appears to have has his fingers sliced off in the fight
column11: was taken to Siem Reap Referral Hospital
column13: the police are investigating and identifying the suspects to take action.------WARNING: Images of scene in link ------POST NEWS
